feed.title: Dawarich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.6
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Import of Owntracks' .rec files now correctly imports points. Previously, the import was failing due to incorrect parsing of the file.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.5...0.15.6

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.7
entry.content:
Fixed

  • A bug where "RuntimeError: failed to get urandom" was being raised upon importing attempt on Synology.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Fix missing urandom by using OpenSSL's random_bytes by @saschazepter in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/280

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.6...0.15.7

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.8
entry.content:
Added

  • User can now select between "Raw" and "Simplified" mode in the map controls. "Simplified" mode will show less points, improving the map performance. "Raw" mode will show all points.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Bump chartkick from 5.1.0 to 5.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/349
  • Points rendering mode by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/347

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.7...0.15.8

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.9
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Stats distance calculation now correctly calculates the daily distances.

Changed

  • Refactored the stats calculation process to make it more efficient.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Fix stats distances and rework stas calculating service by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/353

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.8...0.15.9

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.10
